cast.overview: Three moments in Takaki's life: his relationship with Akari and their forced separation; his friendship with Kanae, who is secretly in love with him; the demands and disappointments of adulthood, an unhappy life in a cold city.
cast.title: 5 Centimeters per Second

details.biography:
Ayaka Onoue (尾上 綾華, Onoue Ayaka, April 2, 1982) is a model, actress and voice actress. After working as a Suntory campaign girl and Wacoal Wing image character, she has appeared regularly in the TV program Sukiri!! (NTV), and has been active in various fields such as commercials and dramas. She was the voice of Akari Shinohara in 5 Centimeters per Second.

Her real and former stage name is 尾上 綾 (Aya Onoue).
details.name: Ayaka Onoue
